title: 「ファイルが見つかりませんでした」表記のメールが消えない
content:
ファイルが見つかりませんでした。ファイルの場所を確認して再度試してください。 
   アドレスに大文字/小文字の違い、その他の間違いがないか確認してください。    ファイルの名前が変更、削除、または移動している可能性があります。

メッセージのコピーはこちら mid:20250720193325552457@saisoncard.co.jp

上記のメッセージが表示されますが、削除できません。 ローカルmailbox内に保存もされていません。 Trashも作り直しましたが無理でした。 差出人は最新のメールアドレスになっていてバグっています。

消す方法を教えてほしいです。
creator: sakuma2

title: Can't log in to yahoo, Javascript missing
content: Yahoo insists on OAuth2 but tb always complains about Javascript missing. I can enter username and then in the the next screen password but the process then hangs, signing in continuing forever.

title: ricezione incompleta mail
content: sono alcuni giorni che ricevo dai clienti alcune mail, ma altre degli stessi clienti non mi arrivano, ho controllato sul sito del provider, le mail sono presenti, ho qualche impostazione sbagliata? saluti

title: Multiple accounts
content: I would like to use Thunderbird to manage multiple accounts. If in a later stadium I have to use a new computer, do I have to set up each account again or will all accounts be immediatly accessible. What if I use multiple computers, do I have to download Thunderbird (off course) and set up each account on both computers? Kind regards, Peter
creator: peterbroeckx2

title: In Windows 11, in "Condividi con" non è presente Thunderbird
content:
Buongiorno a tutti

In WIndows 11, cliccando con il tasto destro su un file, "Condividi con" (= Invia a) non fornisce l'opzione Thunderbird. Ho fatto molte prove, anche assistito prima da Chat GPT e poi da Claude, ma senza risolvere il problema.
creator: Datmann

title: Have this code come up when sending replies on Thurnderbird
content:
Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail: Outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: <[10.252.0.16]>: Helo command rejected: IP address 161.178.137.204 blocked due to abusive authentication behaviour.

Can someone help with the above message

thanks Alan

title: create signatur
content: How can I create a signature in a email?
creator: jo.sanno

title: Impossible to get messages only with pdf type of attachement via the filter in the message search
content:
PDF filter doesn't work

Trying to refine my search to get only emails with PDF files attachment, only get an empty list when mails with PDF are in the base for sure.

Step by step with screenshots here attached sorted by A, B, C.

A - Basic search with "pdf" 

     => 480 attachments files in emails

B - Filtering A search to get only mails from year 2025 

     => in 2025 only 27 emails with attachment - We see in the list result some emails with PDF files attached to it.

C - Trying to get only emails with PDF types attachment, clicking on the top left filter get nothing 

      => It's a bug i guess.

Ubuntu 24.04.3 LTS Thunderbird 140.4.0esr (64 bits)

On 18 November 2025
creator: jesus.nels

title: right hand margin when reading messages on phones
content:
I send a regular bulletin to 40 users. Those who read on a laptop or tablet are happy but those on phones report that in landscape mode all is well but in portrait the right hand margin is about in the centre of the screen.

Is there anything I can do to use the full width of the screen in portrait mode?
creator: BS6600
